title: Flashing Boxes
body: Death Recap and box with weapons flashes during whole match. Starts with screen lines early in the game and then the flashes begin.  Drivers are updated to latest.  Did the same thing before and after the driver update.  Only game this happens on.  AMD R9 390, dual cards.

replies.body: Hmmmm it kinda sounds like your client might actually have some damaged game files pertaining to those menus making them freak out visually. Try running a quick repair through the client options really quick and test it in a custom game.
